Toggle by type 3 errors 6 warnings 0 notices

  • Error/Critical: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

    Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique

    axe: duplicate-id-aria

    <select class="bg-ny-light font-bold appearance-none" id="language-list" name="languages" autocomplete="off"> <option lang="...</select>

    (selector "#language-list")

  • Warning/Moderate: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

    Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark

    axe: landmark-no-duplicate-banner

    <header class="bg-ny-light p-2"> <div class="mx-8 md:mx-20"...</header>

    (selector "html > body > header:nth-child(2)")

  • Warning/Moderate: Ensures landmarks are unique

    Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

    axe: landmark-unique

    <header class="bg-ny-light p-2"> <div class="mx-8 md:mx-20"...</header>

    (selector "html > body > header:nth-child(2)")

  • Error/Serious: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

    Ensures that lists are structured correctly

    axe: list

    <ul> <li><a lang="e...</ul>

    (selector "html > body > footer > div:nth-child(1) > ul")

  • Warning: This element is absolutely positioned and the background color can not be determined. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the background are at least 4.5:1.

    htmlcs: WCAG2AA.Principle1.Guideline1_4.1_4_3.G18.Abs

    <a href="#skip-to-content" class="sr-only focus:not-sr-only text-blue-700 underline">Skip to Main Content</a>

    (selector "html > body > a")
